did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: T-shirts for Green Dragon Day, 1991, 1992, 1996. Also, photographs (13 color, 11 black & white) of the 1959 Beaux Arts Ball and "Save AAP" buttons, 2002.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: T-shirts for Green Dragon Day, 1991, 1992, 1996. Also, photographs (13 color, 11 black & white) of the 1959 Beaux Arts Ball and "Save AAP" buttons, 2002.
